attributes.action: Please keep the Broadmoor Hospital sirens!
attributes.background: Please keep the Broadmoor Hospital sirens working to alert local people to any escape of dangerous patients. Replacement of the sirens by social media and television is not as effective as the instant notification the sirens allow.

rejection.details:
This decision has been taken by  West London Mental Health Trust, in consultation with local parish councils and Bracknell Forest Council.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

Bracknell Forest Council also has a petitions process:

http://democratic.bracknell-forest.gov.uk/mgGeneric.aspx?MD=Petitions&bcr=1
